endpoints.description: Retrieve market price trends for various property types and locations.
Submit parameters to generate a demand forecast report for specific areas.
Discover latest investment hotspots based on submitted filters.
Generate custom analytics reports based on user-defined criteria.
Fetch available property types and their classifications.
Update user-specific analytics and filtering preferences.
Access zoning law details for selected locations.
Remove a previously saved custom report by report ID.
Create tailored data visualizations based on specific parameters.
Compare market analytics across selected regions for informed decision-making.
